SELECT
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROCKY_MEMBER where 1=1 AND `STATUS`=0 AND ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} AND ADDTIME < #{endTimeSec} ) as totalRegMembers ,
(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROCKY_REALNAME_APPRO where ISPASSED = 1 AND APPROVETIME >= #{beginTimeSec} AND APPROVETIME < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalRealNameMembers
, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ROCKY_VIP_APPRO where PASSED = 1 AND ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} AND ADDTIME < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalVIPPassMembers ,
(select COUNT(*) from (SELECT t.* FROM ROCKY_B_TENDERRECORD t,rocky_borrow b where t.BORROW_ID = b.id and b.`STATUS` >= 0 AND t.ADDTIME >= #{beginTimeSec} AND t.ADDTIME < #{endTimeSec} group by t.USER_ID) AS a) as totalTenders ,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(re.MONEY),0) FROM rocky_rechargerecord re LEFT JOIN rocky_member me ON re.USER_ID=me.ID WHERE re.STATUS = 1 and me.IS_FINANCIAL_USER=1 and ( re.TYPE = 1 AND (re.VERIFY_TIME >= #{beginTimeSec} and re.VERIFY_TIME < #{endTimeSec}) or (re.TYPE = 2 and re.VERIFY_TIME2 >= #{beginTimeSec} and re.VERIFY_TIME2 < #{endTimeSec}))) as totalRechargeMoney ,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOTAL),0) FROM rocky_cashrecord WHERE `STATUS` = '2' and VERIFY_TIME2 >= #{beginTimeSec} and VERIFY_TIME2 < #{endTimeSec}) as totalCashMoney ,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE STATUS > 2 and BORROWTYPE =1 and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) >= #{beginTimeSec} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalTJMoney ,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE STATUS > 2 and BORROWTYPE =2 and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) >= #{beginTimeSec} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalDYMoney ,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE STATUS > 2 and BORROWTYPE =3 and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) >= #{beginTimeSec} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalJZMoney ,
( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE STATUS > 2 and BORROWTYPE =4 and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) >= #{beginTimeSec} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalMBMoney ,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0) FROM ROCKY_BORROW WHERE STATUS > 2 and BORROWTYPE =5 and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) >= #{beginTimeSec} and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(ADDTIME) < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalDBMoney ,
(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOTAL),0) FROM rocky_cashrecord WHERE `STATUS` = '1' and VERIFY_TIME2 >= #{beginTimeSec} and VERIFY_TIME2 < #{endTimeSec}) AS totalCGMoney
FROM dual;

select (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(*),0) FROM ROCKY_MEMBER where 1=1 and `STATUS`=0 and FROM_UNIXTIME(ADDTIME) >= DATE(#{beginTime}) and FROM_UNIXTIME(ADDTIME) < DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) as registeredNumber, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT(T1.USER_ID)),0) AS PERSONS FROM ( SELECT T.USER_ID FROM ROCKY_BORROW B,ROCKY_B_COLLECTIONRECORD T WHERE 1=1 AND B.ID=T.BORROW_ID AND (B.STATUS = 4 OR B.STATUS = 5 OR B.STATUS = 42) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(T.ADDTIME) >= DATE(#{beginTime}) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(T.ADDTIME) <DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY)) UNION ALL SELECT T.USER_ID FROM t_fix_borrow B,t_fix_collectionrecord T WHERE 1=1 AND B.ID=T.FIX_BORROW_ID AND B.STATUS IN(5,7) AND T.ADDTIME >= DATE(#{beginTime}) AND T.ADDTIME <DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY)) ) T1) as investmentNumber, (select ifnull(SUM(tftr.ACCOUNT),0)/10000 from t_first_tender_real tftr LEFT JOIN ( select * from ( select FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID,SUCCESS_TIME from t_first_transfer order by SUCCESS_TIME DESC) t group by FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID ) tft on tftr.id=tft.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID LEFT JOIN ( select * from ( select FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID,APPR_TIME from t_first_unlock_appr where `STATUS`=1 order by APPR_TIME DESC) t group by FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID ) tfua on tftr.id=tfua.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID WHERE (tftr.`STATUS` in(0,2,3,5) and tftr.ADDTIME<DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) OR (tftr.`STATUS` = 4 and tft.SUCCESS_TIME<DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) OR (tftr.`STATUS` = 1 and tfua.APPR_TIME>=DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY)))) as trainStockTotal, (select ifnull(SUM(ACCOUNT),0)/10000 from t_first_tender_real where id IN ( select ua.FIRST_TENDER_REAL_ID from t_first_unlock_appr ua where 1=1 and ua.status=1 and DATE_FORMAT(ua.APPR_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE(#{endTime}))) as trainOffTotal, (SELECT IFNULL(ROUND(SUM(d.COLLECTION),2)/10000,0) AS account FROM rocky_account_day_log d WHERE DATE_FORMAT(ADDTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') = DATE(#{endTime}) and user_id >=100000000) as fixStockTotal, (SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.id),0) FROM rocky_borrow b,(select * from (select * from rocky_b_repaymentrecord order by `ORDER` desc ) t group by BORROW_ID) r where b.id=r.BORROW_ID and b.status=5 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') < FROM_UNIXTIME(REPAYMENT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d')>=date(#{beginTime}) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d')<DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) as repaymentEarly, (select IFNULL(SUM(t.account),0)/10000 from (SELECT DISTINCT b.id,b.account FROM rocky_borrow b,(select * from (select * from rocky_b_repaymentrecord order by `ORDER` desc ) t group by BORROW_ID) r where b.id=r.BORROW_ID and b.status=5 AND FROM_UNIXTIME(REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <FROM_UNIXTIME(REPAYMENT_TIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d')>=date(#{beginTime}) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d')<DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) t) as repaymentEarlyTotal,
(SELECT IFNULL(COUNT(DISTINCT b.id),0) FROM rocky_borrow b,(select * from (select * from rocky_b_repaymentrecord order by `ORDER` desc ) t group by BORROW_ID) r where b.id=r.BORROW_ID AND (b.status=5 or b.status=4 or b.status=42) AND IF(r.status = 1,(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')),(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'))) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')>=date(#{beginTime}) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')<DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) as repaymentLate, (select IFNULL(SUM(t.account),0)/10000 from (SELECT DISTINCT b.id,b.account FROM rocky_borrow b,(select * from (select * from rocky_b_repaymentrecord order by `ORDER` desc ) t group by BORROW_ID) r where b.id=r.BORROW_ID AND (b.status=5 or b.status=4 or b.status=42) AND IF(r.status = 1,(FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_YESTIME,'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')),(DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d') > FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d'))) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')>=date(#{beginTime}) AND FROM_UNIXTIME(r.REPAYMENT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d')<DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) t) as repaymentLateTotal, (select IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) from rocky_borrow where status in (4,5,42) and PLEDGE_TYPE=1 and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >=date(#{beginTime}) and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) as repaymentAdd, (select IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0)/10000 from rocky_borrow where status in (4,5,42) and PLEDGE_TYPE=1 and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >=date(#{beginTime}) and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) as repaymentAddTotal, (select IFNULL(COUNT(1),0) from rocky_borrow where status in (4,5,42) and PLEDGE_TYPE=2 and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >=date(#{beginTime}) and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) as standardContinued, (select IFNULL(SUM(ACCOUNT),0)/10000 from rocky_borrow where status in (4,5,42) and PLEDGE_TYPE=2 and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') >=date(#{beginTime}) and FROM_UNIXTIME(PUBLISH_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d') <DATE(DATE_ADD(#{endTime},INTERVAL 1 DAY))) as standardContinuedTotal from dual;
